Title: Ensures that temporary protected status beneficiaries continue to receive Medicaid benefits
Summary: Ensures that temporary protected status beneficiaries continue to receive Medicaid benefits if the federal government ends the program.
LawCode: Add ยง364-k, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to ensuring that temporary protected status beneficiaries continue to receive Medicaid benefits
